echo "# fast-api" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/PragunJaswal/fast-api.git
git push -u origin main

to update 
git add . //for all 
git commit -m "second commit"
git push


//space updaye 
space new
space link 
space push
